section.title: 目标读者
section.para: This book has been written for architects and designers of OpenStack clouds. This book is not intended for people who are deploying OpenStack. For a guide on deploying and operating OpenStack, please refer to the OpenStack Operations Guide (http://docs.openstack.org/openstack-ops).
读者需要有云计算架构和原理的知识背景，企业级系统设计经验，linux和虚拟化经验，以及可理解基本的网络原理和协议。
